name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pigeon - Right mouse click to book video meet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book online meetings while having a chat with your LinkedIn prospects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shuffling tabs to send a meeting invite while having a chat with your LinkedIn prospect.

You don’t want to do this, right?

OK, let’s make it simpler and easier.

Download & Install Pigeon Extension from Chrome Web Store.

As soon as your prospect is ready to schedule an online meeting. Simply click on Pigeon Invite, select your meeting platform (meeting links are asked for the first time so that it can be used for next meetings), check for availability of dates & schedules.

Click on Send Invite & its Done!

- Books video meeting in 30 seconds or less
- Adds guests automatically from the chat room
- Allows you to add additional guests manually
- Notifies you & your guests prior to the schedule
- Dashboard view for your meetings & Guests
- Export your guests (.csv, .xlsx, .pdf) to schedule follow-up email sequences using preferred CRM.

Joinpigeon.com today! Do more before & after meetings.
